post:
TNAHosting is happy to offer the following deals to the LET community. We've been in business since 2012, providing a variety of reliable and cost effective services.  
  
**6GB OpenVZ - Chicago, IL**  
* 1 IPv4 [IPv6 available]  
* 2x vCPU  
* 200GB HDD  
* 2TB Bandwidth  
* $5/month - [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=54)  
  
**512MB OpenVZ - Charlotte, NC**  
* 1 IPv4 [IPv6 available]  
* 2x vCPU  
* 15GB SSD Cached Disk  
* _5TB Bandwidth_  
* $2.50/month - $24/year - [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=56)  

**Dedicated Server E3-1240v2 - Chicago, IL**  
* E3-1240 v2 - 4 Cores/8 Threads @ 3.4Ghz  
* 16GB DDR3 RAM  
* 240GB SSD  
* /29 IPv4 [IPv6 available]  
* 10TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbps  
* Dedicated IPMI  
* $39/month - [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=63)  
  
**Dedicated Server L5420 - Chicago, IL**  
* 2x L5420 – 8 cores @ 2.5GHz  
* 24GB DDR2 RAM  
* 500GB HDD  
* 5TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbps  
* Dedicated IPMI  
* /29 IPv4 [IPv6 available]    
* $29/month – [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=51)   
  
  
Virtual servers are setup instantly after payment. Dedicated servers are setup within 1-3 business days.   
  
Chicago Looking Glass: http://lg.chi.tnahosting.net/  
Charlotte Test IP: 170.75.152.133  
    
We accept PayPal, Major Credit/Debit Cards (Stripe), and Bitcoin.  
  
Have questions or need something custom? Feel free to PM me or open a [sales ticket](https://tnahosting.net/billing/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=2).
